content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a potential tenant named Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for a one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] The negotiation did not result in a finalized price due to the inability to reach a mutual agreement. The landlord, Peter Schmidt, was willing to go down to 1150 Euro per month, but the potential tenant, Haoyu Wang, did not find this price within his budget.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I, as the landlord Peter Schmidt, would not rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, as the conversation was strictly professional and focused on the negotiation of the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I, as the landlord Peter Schmidt, did not feel discriminated or offended at any point in the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt
